name: Only 3 Buttons
description:
Only 3 Buttons is a 2d endless runner submitted as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2020.The theme is "out of control".

Try and get the highest score possible while your controls change as you play!

CONTROLS
You can see the current controls in the top left of the screen.
Slide - Become shorter to fit through smaller gaps
Block - If you are not blocking, purple walls will kill you. If you are blocking, they are safe to travel through.

Thanks for playing :)
